doc.name: CalInterpreter
doc.description:
This actor interprets CAL source as an actor inside the Ptolemy II framework. It has a calCode string attribute that contains the text of a CAL actor. It configures itself according to CAL code string (setting up ports, parameters, types etc.) and then proceeds to execute the actor by interpreting the actions using the DataflowActorInterpreter infrastructure.

The actor interpreter is configured by a context that injects the appropriate Token-based value system into the evaluation of the actions. This is implemented in the class PtolemyPlatform.

For further documentation on CAL, see the Language Report.
doc.author: Jörn W. Janneck, Christopher Chang, Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: The CAL source to be interpreted.
